thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: saolsen11
title: Location, location, location
text:
We love the rue clear neighborhood! This property is located perfectly . . . M stops near by; pleasant and efficient staff; and, QUIET.
We chose not to take the 15 Euro breakfast, but instead wander into this wonderful neighborhood for "local" breakfast . . . We suggest you do the same.
